def main():
    # input
    s = input()
    t = input()

    # initialization
    count = 0

    # count the number of characters different between s and t
    for i in range(len(s)):
        if s[i] != t[i]:
            count += 1

    # output
    print(count)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    s = input()
    t = input()

    print(sum(1 if s != t else 0 for s, t in zip(s, t)))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n = int(input())
s = input()
t = input()

count = 0
for i in range(n):
	if s[i] != t[i]:
		count += 1

print(count)

def main():
    S = input()
    T = input()

    print(sum(1 if s != t else 0 for s, t in zip(S, T)))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n = int(input())
s = input()
t = input()

count = 0
for i in range(n):
	if s[i] != t[i]:
		count += 1

print(count)


def main():
    S = input()
    T = input()

    print(sum(1 for s, t in zip(S, T) if s != t))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


# https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc085/tasks/abc085_a

n = int(input())
s = input()
t = input()

count = 0
for i in range(n):
	if s[i] != t[i]:
		count += 1

print(count)
